SEARCH
Package com.petfoster.controllers

Class PetController

java.lang.Object
com.petfoster.controllers.PetController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/pets") public class PetController extends Object
Controller class for managing Pet operations. Handles requests related to Pet management and communicates with the service layer.

      id - the ID of the Pet to fetch
      Returns:
      the PetDTO of the fetched pet

      Fetches all Pets.
      Returns:
      a list of all PetDTOs

    • getImageById

      @GetMapping("/img/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<byte[]> getImageById(@PathVariable int petId)
      Fetches the image of a Pet by its ID.
      Parameters:
      petId - the ID of the Pet to fetch the image
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the image as a byte array

    • addNewPet

      @PostMapping("/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PetDTO> addNewPet(@PathVariable Long userId, @RequestPart("petDetails") PetDTO petDTO, @RequestPart("imageData") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile imageFile)
      Adds a new Pet.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user adding the pet
      petDTO - the details of the pet to add
      imageFile - the image file of the pet
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the created PetDTO

    • updatePet

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public PetDTO updatePet(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody PetDTO petDTO)
      Updates an existing Pet based on the provided ID and Pet data.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Pet to be updated
      petDTO - the updated Pet data
      Returns:
      the updated Pet data

    • deletePet

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public void deletePet(@PathVariable Long id)
      Deletes an existing Pet based on the provided ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Pet to be deleted

    • getByAge

      @GetMapping("/age/{age}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<PetDTO> getByAge(@PathVariable Integer age)
      Retrieves a list of Pets based on the provided user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose Pets are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the list of Pets

    • getByUserId

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<PetDTO>> getByUserId(@PathVariable Long userId)
      Handles HTTP GET requests for retrieving a list of pets associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose pets are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing a list of PetDTO objects associated with the specified user
